content: This game has malware and it won't give me a refund
I really enjoyed the story but was a little dissappointed the ending was a cliffhanger and it only covered Semester 1. I eagerly await the next installment (hoping there will be one).
I literally purchased this app...but it says I didn't so I can't play it. Had to refund even though you literally have to pay for it to download it...
The Halloween update is awesome. Such a fan of this series

This is a review for the new Halloween DLC, for the confused or curious. I think this DLC a great addition to the base game. It delves into the world a lot more, letting you get the flavour of different cultures, and helping you orient your PC in relation to how they react to those cultures. Furthermore, it really lets you have some more time with some of the core and important secondary/future LI cast members, which is only ever a good thing. It's great fun exploring each of the offered events with Jun and Ay'cure vs Kess and Umbrave, and how that changes things narratively. I especially loved seeing Kess and Umbrave interact, since we spend most of our narrative time with Jun already, and when we are with the others are not generally in a big group. Overall, it's a lot of fun and I think adds its weight in gold to the game's content. There is currently something a bit hinky with the code, but from what I can tell contacting support, this is not a bug that existed before publication. Moreover, it seems to be an issue more on COG's end that Leigh or Rea's. As such, I'm not letting it impact my score. To my knowledge this is one of the first times something like this has been published, and so it makes sense to me that the system isn't perfected yet. There are a few typos dotted around, but I genuinely enjoyed my experience with this DLC immensely, and would encourage anyone who's enjoyed the content thus far to play it.

Always loved this series & have been waiting for the last installment of it since forever. Instead of giving us the last part of it, we're having to pay extra for additional content. Now questioning if this unfinished (and taking forever to finish) series is even worth the money. Just give us the finale!

A great story. There's a multitude of endings so I'm a little confused by the review saying no, as your end stats+beginning stats as you build you character and make choices are different. Even the passages can be drastically different depending on your skill levels, and how you've treated characters thus far. There are also quite a lot of 'secret' achievements that depend on your answers so it's been fun to go back and try and find the correct combination
Your choices do not matter in this game. This is more of a book than a interactive story. If you want your character to have a say in things in a story, dont download this game.
Good game but shorter than expected. The ending felt a little rushed. Otherwise, I definitely enjoyed it and bought book 2

A good story is held back by a overly complex skill system.Some skills feel dead while others don't have enough descriptions to them.Also sense the game came out years ago it's highly unlikely to finish the narrative.

Love most of your games but this one... needed a bit more work. There were quite alot of spelling/grammer errors that kept tripping me up while I was reading through. Definitely interupted the immersion. I did like that there was alot of variety, but the stat requirements for success are soo high, it's hard to achieve anything and daunting, knowing that I'd have to start again just to swap out that 1 decision after an hour of gameplay. Great game, but not finished...
great story, I was on edge the whole second half x.x
Story is interesting and characters as well. But I am somewhat frustrated that the stats are not explained in a way that shows how these affect choices or what these mean.
I absolutely love all of tge COG LLC games. I have question though, why don't all games have achievements?
loved it.
Fair story, but did not feel like choices had meaningful consequences. More of a novel than a CYOA.
It was charming
Amazing cant wait for part 3

Best of the best. Great story and characters, I don't know why I didn't 
review until now!

I can't believe that this flew under my radar. I am a big fan of HP and playing this game reminds me a lot of the HP verse. Looking forward to playing Book 2 and I read over the CoG forums that the author is currently doing the last book of the series. Looking forward to it!
Hoping for more.
It was..  Something..  Honestly it did have a lot of potential but sadly didn't hit the mark.
Oh my gosh, I love It! Can't wait to play the second one. Hopefully you continue this series. Have fun, and good luck!

The game felt kinda short but that also might be caused by the unsatisfying abrupt ending. The concept of the story is great and could of easily landed closer to a 4 star rating but the length, lack in depth in some areas, and the poor ending shot it down for me. An important event near the ending seems to require a specific skill enhanced and by that a specific choice you have to make or "die", what i mean by "die" is you can come back to life but with drawbacks. If you do make that choice, it gives a strong feeling of not controlling the story at all and that you have to follow a laid out path and cant branch out. Its really a shame really, it seemed good with good reviews and has a pretty good concept story with fantasy but this seems really disappointing, im guessing why this is getting good reviews is maybe because of the sequel but im not sure and seems to be a big risk to take since it must be purchased.
Good story fun as hell keep it up love these type of games
I kept putting this off and just got bored and got it. I must say this certainly is one of the best story's I've started reading! I hope they release a part 3.

This is the first game in a series that was supposed to be finished in 2014. To date, there is no third installment and there probably will never be. This shouldn't even be online since you can't finish the adventure.
I love this story so much! ♡ I hope the next one is still coming :D
You have such an amazing world here i can barely explain it. Your game is head and shoulders above a lot of others. It is an interactive novel for sure!!!
Veary good game a littel to short tho.

It's good to see an author who appreciates the subtle differences in how something is stated, and how a small choice can make all the difference in how a situation pans out.  Even if a player chooses something not ideal for a situation to come, the author has put in a system where there are consequences, but it does not end the game right there.  That kind of flexibility and vast branching choice tree is the essence of a decent visual novel.
I can't wait for part 3

Hardly any opportunity to build up your stats and I can not beat the dragon wraith at the end for the life of me no matter which options I choose. Already restarted over five times trying to beat it! Turns out that unless you have a very specific skill you can't beat it, basically rendering every choice you've made previously useless. Not pleased and I really regret buying the second one before playing through the first :/
Great
Overall, an entertaining game
Best ever. Period. Seriously the best. Can't wait for part three.
Ended as it got good which ticked me off. The fact that the story doesn't  appear to be finished yet as well as it is sometimes hard to tell who's talking all contribute to a loss of one star.

Fraught with grammatical errors and mediocre writing. You're not given many choices on WHAT to say, but only HOW you say it. Overall, the story is alright, but the writing makes it confusing. Sometimes, I just can't tell who is speaking, there's a plethora of awkward dialogue, and poor descriptions.
I loved the story so much the only thing that bothers me is having to wait for the third part.
Enjoyed, one of my favorite CYOA.
I think this is my favorite so far. I got so attached to the characters and I really got into the story. I would definitely recommend this one.
I do have one problem and that is the wait I have to endure for part 3.
One of the very best interactive novels I've read - over and over and over. Wish there were more like this.
Love the decisive nature and looking forward to your third instalment
best cog
Loved it!
This game is very well written to the point that I can't stop playing till I finish it. I even keep playing again and again to discover each route. Kudos to the writer for this masterpiece.
You guys are great
Great piece of work. Can't wait to read the next.

... Is that the second installment hasn't come yet. This is a seriously well-thought out piece of work. None of the current CoG games even come close.  -EDIT-  Gave it a 5 now because of Way Walkers University 2
My favorite of their released apps so far!
Check out "King Of Awkwardtv" on YouTube for hilarious prank videos. So funny!!!
One of the best multiple choice games I've ever played. Only wish I could give it more stars!
Great story
I wouldnt have bought it if I'd known you wouldn't update it.
Man, I keep playing this over and over again.

This game is fun but make no mistake, it is not a complete game. It is part of a game. And I hate paying for something that is an incomplete experience so much that I am unlikely to purchase from this publisher in future.
I can't wait for the end!
I enjoyed playing this game. Its fun and enjoyable to play. Await the second part.

Especially towards the end of the game, where unless you choose a very specific skill and have to rely on a certain character (and in the process reduces her to nothing but the Deus ex Machina), you're going to die and lose your skills no matter what. This, for me, is very forced. The skills you've developed don't matter if they don't fit the author's criteria. Now I feel bad I'm too impulsive and have already bought the second game.

I've been playing these types of games for a few years now, and I have to say - this one is possibly the best. This experience was very much worth the money; the characters were very well detailed and constructed, and the imagery for this world simply wondrous. I can very gladly rate this five stars. I absolutely loved reading this! I recommend this to anyone who loves fantasy and adventure.
I've replayed this loads and it's always different!!! Hurry up with the next one!! It's nearly the end of April now :-(

Aside from the usually acceptable grammar slip-ups, this story was very decently written, with many choices to be made in personalizing and role-playing your character (wait, I can have "become immortal" as one of my motivations?  +1 Interesting, +250 xp; WRITER has LEVELED UP!)  Admittedly, I never felt overtly punished for my choices in-game, which is somewhat disappointing, but some choices were locked out, and I appreciate that (assuming this was due to prior decisions I made and not a bug.)
The second one is more exciting :D
Excelsior
Took quite a few tries to figure out how to avoid dying! Actually can't wait to play part 2 now.

This is my first interactive novel game, and I enjoyed it. The story plays out like a rational Harry Potter-esque plot with you, as a new student with special talents, heading off to school for the first time. Only takes a few hours to play through, and you can always start again to make different choices. Enjoyable, low-demand, and relaxing game.

If your into these type of games then this would probably be the funniest/good choices not to short too whats better so take my advice and get this game plus the second and third one keep whriting good storys and I  be your best customer
Great story, interesting choices.

It's very well written, that's for sure. The characters are also fleshed out to a surprising degree, and I enjoyed getting to know the classmates. Having different paths to the ending was also a very welcome change compared to many of the other games in the market.
Really unique
This series is easily one of the best choice of game series that there is. You can easily replay and always get a different outcome. Worth the money and I can't commend this app enough.

As I said, I spent a full day, a sunday by the way, playing the series (one route) from start to finish. And to be quite frank, I was disappointed heavily. No... not the way you're thinking. I was disappointed that there wasn't a sequel. Aren't I funny?   Either way, I was expecting magic and the such when I started the series, but I wasn't expecting such a deep plot. Or to be affected much by my choices. I spent minutes on some parts, deciding whether or not I should do something. I took a mostly objective approach to decisions and was pleased to not be seen as so much of a 'villain'. I ended up with a 30 'The RED' score, but that was mostly from things that were obviously 'evil'. Otherwise I would have had a solid score. The point is, I wasn't punished for not taking the route of your stereotypical hero.  Although I think I might just be ranting now. I'll get to the point. The game, if that's the right definition for this, is wonderful. The game doesn't seem linear, but there was one or two times where I was given choices that I didn't like. But I wont spoil them for you. Get the game, you most likely wont regret it, I know I didn't.
There is going to be another one ...right?

I've wanted to say so much about how wonderful this series is but honestly there just aren't enough words to properly express my love. This is the series I suggest to get people into the genre. Dying for the next installment!
unbelievably great
Best
this is only the begining and I'm hungry for more. the author priced it very reasonably and it is worth it
A smart in depth game. I look forward to read the next two.
One word "AMAZING" more series please I'm willing to buy more.

I like the storyline so far but there seems to be some issues. Sometimes it doesn't let me choose different options. Its not low lighted or anything. I'm forced to make choices in the the story I don't want to make. Please fix. Keep in mind I'm not talking about things you can't do because it would contradict the storyline
of a wonderful journey. I loved the characters, the premise and the world. One of my absolute favourites.
Cant wait to see more
Does feel a little short.
Good story. But feel short and sometime feel restrict to choice I can choose.

After the recent update,  I don't have a choice to make my gender male.  Its always female even if I pick '' you're a boy,  just like me'' please fix this.  Thank you :)  other than that,  love the story!!

*Update* If you liked this story, stay tuned for the second part: Way walkers 2!   I remember when this first came out I was reluctant to play at first, since I was pretty swamped. But one I did start, the more I read on, the more I ended up falling on love with Way Walkers. The world has a lot of potential, and even though it had to be simplified for the sake of keeping one's sanity. It's still amazing, and the author has done a wonderful job of making either way.

*update*--sequel to be released on 10/10/13!!! The characters are well-written and your choices genuinely effect the direction of the story. The world itself also seems to be very expansive as there is a bunch of supplemental information available.
Awesome
The dang game ends after so called 1st semester. To me its 1/2 complete. Story is good and very abruptly ends, seems to me in the middle. Really left me disapointed.
Awesome story line with amazing detail in the writings well worth the price but I can't wait for the next one too
Since it came out and still no part 2?? I will rate 5 stars again when part 2 comes out.
The rest of the story cannot come out soon enough! Excellent game/story!
Seriously this is the best Cog has to offer. Only game of there's that's worth the money.
Great depth - this was written by an artist. Hosted disappointed me with the superhero one - but this was a pleasure. It needs completion.

I'm glad I brought this. I love chose your own adventure books and so far this is one of the best ones next to choice of romance. I'm really loving the original story and it is very detailed. You have multiple choices to choose from with each decision which offers high replay ability. I'm just getting started but I can already see this game becoming lengthy just with how involved the story is and the amount of thought that went into it. Good job.
Why this game that i played only last for 1 semester? Any guidence
Lots of times to make choices. I dont normally buy apps... But I had some spare money so i went for it and I can honestly say I dont regret it

One of the best I've seen on the app store. Can't wait to see the next chapters.
Best hosted game!
Really good albeit a bit short really hope the second part comes out and isn't left like Choice of Vampire
It's really good.  I really hope the the rest of the story releases soon.  I hate cliffhangers haha

This is such an amazing game. All of the characters are insanely well written, story line is one of the best ever created and completely thought out. I really hope the second installment comes soon. To everyone... THIS IS WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!!!

This is seriously such an awesome game. I found myself skipping a night out with friends just to finish the story -_- Really though the story is so detailed and interesting I felt like I was really a part of this magical world. Please release the second installment soon!!!
Well written and fun, you're offered many choices and fleshed out characters.

I love this game.. I only wish there was a good romance option.. Haha am i the only one who named their angel Castiel and named their character Dean?? Sorry Supernatural fan moment xD This game was deffo worth buying.

Great! Can't wait till next part!

AWESOME!
Was completely enthralled throughout. Got far more value than i had hoped for and can not wait for the sequel!! :)
This is easily on par (if not better) than the choice of games. Just hope I can have a romance with another guy.

Well worth the price. Can't wait until the next one.
Wow pretty much sums it up. Amazing, worthy of being the first part of a book. Please please please finish this interactive novel. So freaking good.

The characters and story are very well developed.  This is one of the best choice of games ive played yet. It actually gives you a choice unlike that s*** ME3. Can't wait until the next one come out looking foward to getting to know the side characters.

This is an amazing story bases in a colorful world. I love the choices and the characters and I especially love the length. Wish it didn't end and cannot wait until the next installment. Plenty of replay value as there are so many different choices and character options. My only complaint is I did notice some of spelling/grammar errors, but that does not hurt the value of this game!
Eagerly awaiting the next installment
This hosted game is extremely well written! Totally worth the fee and was very fun... only real worry is waiting for a sequel... Hopefully soon!
Actually wasn't that bad.
Lots, and I mean it when I say lots, of replay value.
I have to agree with niklas, I totally named my angel sim and my character kvothe

If you've played Zombie Exodus, I'd recommend this. If you haven't, I'd reccomend both. The attention to detail in these two Hosted Games is what really sets them apart from the competition. They are well written, cleverly developed and perfectly branched. Each playthrough really is personal to you. For the small price it's at - Which way you will walk?
I really liked this game, it reminded me of The Kingkiller Chronicle by Patrick Rothfuss. Worth the money :)
